scripts.install:meteor: cd meteor && meteor --version && meteor npm install -g yarn && node ../scripts/fix-windows-yarn.js && meteor yarn install
scripts.install:packages: cd packages && (node is_node_14.js && yarn lerna run --ignore openapi install || yarn install)
scripts.start: yarn install && run install-and-build && run dev
scripts.validate:release: yarn install && run install-and-build && run validate:release:packages && run validate:release:meteor
scripts.validate:release:meteor: cd meteor && meteor yarn validate:prod-dependencies && meteor yarn license-validate && meteor yarn lint && meteor yarn test
scripts.validate:release:packages: cd packages && run validate:dependencies && run test
scripts.test-all: yarn install && run install-and-build && run check-types:meteor && run lint:packages && run lint:meteor && run test:packages && run test:meteor
